Hi, I'm Eric!

I'm currently a full-stack software engineer at Stripe on the Device Management team, where I build tools to allow Stripe customers to manage their fleets of Stripe terminals. I graduated in May 2025 from MIT with a B.S. in Computer Science.

Pokerbot

Bot that plays a variant of poker against similar bots during MIT's Pokerbots competition. Trained using counterfactual regret minimization.
